verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> toward Jerusalem וְהַטֵּ֖ף <S%H5197><s%> and drop אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against מִקְדָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H4720><s%> [thy word] toward the holy places וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> against the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> And say לְאַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> to the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלַ֔יִךְ <S%H413><s%> I am against וְהוֹצֵאתִ֥י <S%H3318><s%> Behold I [am] against thee and will draw forth חַרְבִּ֖י <S%H2719><s%> my sword מִתַּעְרָ֑הּ <S%H8593><s%> out of his sheath וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> from thee the righteous וְרָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked

יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Seeing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I הִכְרַ֥תִּי <S%H3772><s%> then that I will cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> from thee the righteous וְרָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> therefore תֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> go forth חַרְבִּ֧י <S%H2719><s%> therefore shall my sword מִתַּעְרָ֛הּ <S%H8593><s%> out of his sheath אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> against all flesh מִנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> from the south צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> to the north

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> may know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> That all flesh כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <S%H3318><s%> have drawn forth חַרְבִּ֖י <S%H2719><s%> my sword מִתַּעְרָ֑הּ <S%H8593><s%> out of his sheath לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> It will not תָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> it shall not return עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again ס

וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> therefore thou son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man הֵֽאָנַ֑ח <S%H584><s%> Sigh בְּשִׁבְר֤וֹן <S%H7670><s%> with the breaking מָתְנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4975><s%> of [thy] loins וּבִמְרִיר֔וּת <S%H4814><s%> and with bitterness תֵּֽאָנַ֖ח <S%H584><s%> sigh לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> and shall be brought to pass כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and when יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And it shall be when they say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> Because עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> how long אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> Wherefore נֶאֱנָ֑ח <S%H584><s%> unto thee Wherefore sighest וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <S%H559><s%> thou? that thou shalt answer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> Because שְׁמוּעָ֣ה <S%H8052><s%> For the tidings כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> and when בָאָ֡ה <S%H935><s%> because it cometh וְנָמֵ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> shall melt כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every לֵב֩ <S%H3820><s%> and every heart וְרָפ֨וּ <S%H7503><s%> shall be feeble כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָדַ֜יִם <S%H3027><s%> and all hands וְכִהֲתָ֣ה <S%H3543><s%> shall faint כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and every spirit וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בִּרְכַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H1290><s%> and all knees תֵּלַ֣כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> will be weak מַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> [as] water הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָאָה֙ <S%H935><s%> behold it cometh וְנִֽהְיָ֔תָה <S%H1961><s%> become נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵא֙ <S%H5012><s%> prophesy וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> and say כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> the Lord אֱמֹ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Say חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> A sword חֶ֛רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword הוּחַ֖דָּה <S%H2300><s%> is sharpened וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also מְרוּטָֽה׃ <S%H4803><s%> and also furbished

לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of טְבֹ֤חַ <S%H2874><s%> to make a sore טֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2873><s%> slaughter הוּחַ֔דָּה <S%H2300><s%> It is sharpened לְמַעַן־ <S%H4616><s%> because of הֱיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָ֥הּ בָּ֖רָק <S%H1300><s%> that it may glitter מֹרָ֑טָּה <S%H4803><s%> Polished א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> should נָשִׂ֔ישׂ <S%H7797><s%> we then make mirth שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the rod בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> of my son מֹאֶ֥סֶת <S%H3988><s%> ? it contemneth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> [as] every tree

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> And he hath given אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> לְמָרְטָ֖ה <S%H4803><s%> it to be furbished לִתְפֹּ֣שׂ <S%H8610><s%> may be handled בַּכָּ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> branch הִֽיא־ <S%H1931><s%> he הוּחַ֤דָּה <S%H2300><s%> is sharpened חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> this sword וְהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he מֹרָ֔טָּה <S%H4803><s%> and polished לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> it into the hand הוֹרֵֽג׃ <S%H2026><s%> of the slayer

זְעַ֤ק <S%H2199><s%> Cry וְהֵילֵל֙ <S%H3213><s%> and howl בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he הָיתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> is against בְעַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> for it shall be upon my people הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> it [shall be] upon all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מְגוּרֵ֤י <S%H4048><s%> terrors אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by reason of חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> the sword הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> shall be upon my people לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore סְפֹ֥ק <S%H5606><s%> smite אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יָרֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3409><s%> therefore upon [thy] thigh

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because בֹ֔חַן <S%H974><s%> Because [it is] a trial וּמָ֕ה <S%H4100><s%> and what אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the rod מֹאֶ֖סֶת <S%H3988><s%> and what if [the sword] contemn לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> declares אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Thou therefore son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵ֕א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy וְהַ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> together כַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> hands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> hands וְתִכָּפֵ֞ל <S%H3717><s%> be doubled חֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and let the sword שְׁלִישִׁ֙תָה֙ <S%H7992><s%> the third חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> time the sword חֲלָלִ֔ים <S%H2491><s%> of the slain הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> It חֶ֚רֶב <S%H2719><s%> it [is] the sword חָלָ֣ל <S%H2491><s%> [men that are] slain הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great הַחֹדֶ֖רֶת <S%H2314><s%> which entereth into their privy chambers לָהֶֽם׃

לְמַ֣עַן ׀ <S%H4616><s%> because of לָמ֣וּג <S%H4127><s%> may faint לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> that [their] heart וְהַרְבֵּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> be multiplied הַמִּכְשֹׁלִ֔ים <S%H4383><s%> and [their] ruins עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שַׁ֣עֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8179><s%> against all their gates נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have set אִבְחַת־ <S%H19><s%> the point חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword אָ֛ח <S%H253><s%> ah עֲשׂוּיָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [it is] made לְבָרָ֖ק <S%H1300><s%> bright מְעֻטָּ֥ה <S%H4593><s%> [it is] wrapped up לְטָֽבַח׃ <S%H2875><s%> Tebah

הִתְאַחֲדִ֥י <S%H258><s%> Go thee one way or other הֵימִ֖נִי <S%H3231><s%> the right hand הָשִׂ֣ימִי <S%H7760><s%> [either] on הַשְׂמִ֑ילִי <S%H8041><s%> [or] on the left אָ֖נָה <S%H575><s%> whithersoever פָּנַ֥יִךְ <S%H6440><s%> thy face מֻעָדֽוֹת׃ <S%H3259><s%> [is] set

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I אַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> I will also smite כַפִּי֙ <S%H3709><s%> mine hands אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כַּפִּ֔י <S%H3709><s%> together וַהֲנִחֹתִ֖י <S%H5117><s%> to rest חֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2534><s%> and I will cause my fury אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> have said פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me again saying

וְאַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Also thou son אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> appoint לְךָ֣ ׀ שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> thee two דְּרָכִ֗ים <S%H1870><s%> ways לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> may come חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> that the sword מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> out of one יֵצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> shall come forth שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> both twain וְיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> thou a place בָּרֵ֔א <S%H1254><s%> and choose בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [it] at the head דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> of the way עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> to the city בָּרֵֽא׃ <S%H1254><s%> choose

דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way תָּשִׂ֔ים <S%H7760><s%> Appoint לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> may come חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> that the sword אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> רַבַּ֣ת <S%H7237><s%> to Rabbath בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> and to Judah בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem בְּצוּרָֽה׃ <S%H1219><s%> the defenced

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָמַ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> stood מֶלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> For the king בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at אֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> at the parting הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> of the way בְּרֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> at the head שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> of the two הַדְּרָכִ֖ים <S%H1870><s%> ways לִקְסָם־ <S%H7080><s%> to use קָ֑סֶם <S%H7081><s%> divination קִלְקַ֤ל <S%H7043><s%> bright בַּֽחִצִּים֙ <S%H2671><s%> he made [his] arrows שָׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> he consulted בַּתְּרָפִ֔ים <S%H8655><s%> with images רָאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> he looked בַּכָּבֵֽד׃ <S%H3516><s%> in the liver

בִּֽימִינ֞וֹ <S%H3225><s%> At his right hand הָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came הַקֶּ֣סֶם <S%H7081><s%> was the divination יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> for Jerusalem לָשׂ֤וּם <S%H7760><s%> to appoint כָּרִים֙ <S%H3733><s%> captains לִפְתֹּ֤חַ <S%H6605><s%> to open פֶּה֙ <S%H6310><s%> the mouth בְּרֶ֔צַח <S%H7524><s%> in the slaughter לְהָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> to lift up ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> with shouting לָשׂ֤וּם <S%H7760><s%> to appoint כָּרִים֙ <S%H3733><s%> [battering] rams עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שְׁעָרִ֔ים <S%H8179><s%> against the gates לִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> to cast סֹלְלָ֖ה <S%H5550><s%> a mount לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> [and] to build דָּיֵֽק׃ <S%H1785><s%> a fort

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֤ם [כִּקְסֹום־ כ] (כִּקְסָם־ <S%H7080><s%> divination שָׁוְא֙ <S%H7080><s%> divination ק) בְּעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> in their sight שְׁבֻעֵ֥י <S%H7650><s%> to them that have sworn שְׁבֻע֖וֹת <S%H7621><s%> oaths לָהֶ֑ם וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he מַזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> but he will call to remembrance עָוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity לְהִתָּפֵֽשׂ׃ <S%H8610><s%> that they may be taken פ
